text: First visit to Koh Dental for scaling and polishing. Dr Sven Ng and nurse were friendly and made sure I felt comfortable and relaxed. Dr Ng was also detailed in explaining what they were doing at each stage. Overall it was a pleasant experience and I would recommend Dr Ng. Thank you!

1. Customer service is very rude.
2. Customer service no good give alot of excuse never give advice
3. Doctor and customer service said different words

I only can say is This is the first time n last time to go no more going to this place
And want to believe up to u. Is this true
hope your clinic can change better service.

Special thanks to Koh Dental for accommodating me after I mistook my appointment date! ðŸ˜… Saw Dr Sven Ng for the first time today and he was extremely reassuring and thoughtful, and gave good advice. Thank you so much Dr Sven and nurses/receiptionists, really appreciated it!

Came here upon mum's recommendation as my regular dentist was on long vacation. Didn't ask for his name but would like to compliment for his assuring and calm personality. Despite my phobia in going to a dentist, I had a pleasant experience today, thank you... will be back!

Really the best dental experience of my life. For the first time I felt relaxed in the patient's chair. The dentist was extremely gentle and explained at each stage what she was doing during the scaling and polishing process, and asked me to let her know through raising my hand if I was experiencing discomfort at any point. Could not recommend this place more!
